short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically refreshes all tabs at specified intervals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⟳ Tab Refresh Pro: Stay Updated with Automatic Tab Reloading

Tired of manually refreshing tabs to see the latest content? 
Tab Refresh Pro automates the process, keeping your tabs up-to-date at customizable intervals.

Here's what Tab Refresh Pro offers:
» Automatic Reloading: Set a refresh interval (e.g., every minute, 5 minutes, or even hourly) and let Tab Refresh Pro handle the rest.
» Simple and Efficient: Easy-to-use interface allows you to quickly configure refresh times for all your open tabs.
» Improved Productivity: Stay focused on your tasks while Tab Refresh Pro ensures you have the latest information displayed.
» Peace of Mind: Never miss an update on dynamic webpages with automatic tab refreshing.

Who is Tab Refresh Pro for?
» Anyone who relies on up-to-date information on webpages (e.g., social media feeds, news sites, stock tickers, auction listings).
» Users who manage multiple tabs and want to avoid manual refreshing.
» People who value increased productivity and efficiency while browsing the web.

⬇️ Download Tab Refresh Pro today and experience the convenience of automatic tab refreshing!
